author: Staff Reporter
text:
Sankar Nagar police arrested three students, all under the age of 17, on the charges of assaulting the conductor of a Metropolitan Transport Corporation (MTC) bus on Friday evening.

According to police sources, the trio was pulled up by conductor Achuthan, who works on bus route number 266, which operates between Avadi and Tambaram, for footboard travelling. In an argument that ensued, the students allegedly slapped the conductor and fled.

The MTC crew joined the agitated conductor and urged the Sankar Nagar police to take action against the three students who attacked the conductor.

After an hour-long standoff, policemen managed to pacify the agitating crew.

Traffic hit

Traffic was affected on Pammal Main Road for more than an hour, police added. On a complaint from the conductor, the Sankar Nagar police arrested the students and they were sent to the Juvenile Home in Kellys.
title: Three students held for assaulting conductor
